value:
Don't make me laugh. You know what
lies ahead if you cling to the Church
of Seiros' filthy teachings!

I see quite a few familiar faces here.
How irritating.

Should you rise against me like a fool
forgetting their place, I will crush you
like the worthless beast you are.$k$pAnd you will thank me for it.

Everyone looks positively saintly,
don't they? Ugh, how vile. If only
I was not bound by contract...$k$pI suppose I will play nice for now.

Victory comes at the cost of sacrifice.
Surely, even you are not so foolish as
to deny this.

I am Cornelia Arnim, a mage from
FÃ³dlan who was summoned by
$Nf.

Won't you be a dear and wallow in
despair for me?

Heheheh. How marvelous. Entertain
me more, if you dare.
Tsk... What brutes.

Oh, for me? One can never be too
prepared, after all.

I am Cornelia Arnim, court mage of
the Holy Kingdom of Faerghus, and
I expect to be for some time...

Summoner, I presume you were the
one who called me to this world...$k$pKnowing full well who I am, you made
ready to welcome me as your ally to
attain victory in battle. Correct?$k$pHeheh, such an avaricious desire
for victory... I don't hate it. In fact,
it makes me feel right at home.$k$pThis world is so beset by threats that
you need strength like mine. There is
not a moment's respite, is there?$k$pHahaha! It sounds enthralling! I don't
typically play with beasts, but if I can
toy with them until their last breath...$k$pOh, my, look at me getting all worked
up. This body will never hold out if I
let myself get carried away like that.$k$pI suppose I should take my time and
really enjoy myself, then...
I'll take good care of you.
Don't look at me like that!
Hahahahaha!
Sweet dreams.
No...
Pathetic.
Get up.
I am Cornelia. How lovely to make your acquaintance. *chuckle*
That Dimitri is such a troublesome young man...
Patricia was willing to sacrifice anyone or anything. I granted her wish, in exchange for the king's head...
*Chuckle* You should be wallowing in despair about now.
You seem quite useful. Perhaps I should take you home with me...
Oh, fine.
Hmm.
Dear me.
